:orphan:

Examples showing various jumeg analysis. 



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    </div>

Causality analysis. 



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Example showing how to plot a causality matrix on a circle plot.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /auto_examples/causality/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_causality_circle_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_causality_plot_causality_circle.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Plot Causality Matrix</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Group a causality matrix by lobes and plot the resulting inter- and intra-lobe causality.">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /auto_examples/causality/images/thumb/sphx_glr_plot_inter_and_intra_lobe_causality_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_causality_plot_inter_and_intra_lobe_causality.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Group Causality Matrix</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="Perform Granger based causality analysis using Generalized Parital Directed Coherence on exampl...">

.. only:: html

  .. image:: /auto_examples/causality/images/thumb/sphx_glr_do_granger_causality_thumb.png
    :alt:

  :ref:`sphx_glr_auto_examples_causality_do_granger_causality.py`

.. raw:: html

      <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnail-title">Granger Causality Analysis</div>
    </div>


.. raw:: html

    </div>
